title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, September 2, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Albert Goodwill Spalding (1850), a baseball player and a founder of the sporting goods company A.G. Spalding and Brothers.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Albert Goodwill Spalding (1850), a baseball player and a founder of the sporting goods company A.G. Spalding and Brothers.
